summary: Implements the DDIM inference scheduler for Stable Diffusion, managing timestep selection, beta/alpha schedule computation, and numerical stability mechanisms (clipping, thresholding, alpha handling) to transform model predictions into progressively denoised samples during generation.
business_intent: Enable reliable and efficient image generation in multimodal AI products by providing a stable diffusion scheduler that supports fast, highâ€‘quality sampling for downstream applications such as content creation, design assistance, and visual AI services.
